**Ice dragon scales** are a medium-weight body armour. They provide 2 ranks of [cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") (rC++), but 1 rank of fire vulnerability (rF-).

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay an [ice dragon](/Ice_dragon "Ice dragon").

## Desirability

Ice dragon scales offer almost as much AC as a [plate armour](/Plate_armour "Plate armour"), but with much lower encumbrance. Therefore, they are good for casters/[EV](/EV "EV")-based fighters who can afford the weight, or melee brutes with no heavier scales available. It's often best to wait until you have a source of fire resistance, as taking 150% damage from fire can be dangerous.

This item has better stats than [fire dragon scales](/Fire_dragon_scales "Fire dragon scales"): ice scales offer +1 base AC (and +1 max [enchantment](/Enchant "Enchant")) with no extra encumbrance. However, players may prefer fire resistance over cold resistance. This mostly applies to [Zot](/Zot "Zot"), as [orbs of fire](/Orbs_of_fire "Orbs of fire") exist, but orbs of ice don't.

Paradoxically, a [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") specialist may actually find these scales useful: combined with a [staff of fire](/Staff_of_fire "Staff of fire") and a [ring of fire](/Ring_of_fire "Ring of fire"), such a character would have two spell enhancers, and a level each of fire and cold resistance.

[Trolls](/Troll "Troll") and [Oni](/Oni "Oni"), unable to wear normal [plate armour](/Plate_armour "Plate armour"), may want to wear these even without fire resistance. Just be careful with it.

## History

- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), ice dragon scales were called ice dragon armour, and it was obtained by using a [scroll of enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") on a [ice dragon hide](/Ice_dragon_hide "Ice dragon hide").

From CrawlWiki

Name Ice dragon scales
Size to wear Any

Encumbrance rating 11
Maximum Enchantment +9
Grants rC++, rF-
Time to Wear 5


The scales of a cold-breathing dragon. It provides great protection from cold, while rendering its wearer more susceptible to fire.

Ice dragon scales are a medium-weight body armour. They provide 2 ranks of cold resistance (rC++), but 1 rank of fire vulnerability (rF-).

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay an ice dragon.

Desirability

Ice dragon scales offer almost as much AC as a plate armour, but with much lower encumbrance. Therefore, they are good for casters/EV-based fighters who can afford the weight, or melee brutes with no heavier scales available. It's often best to wait until you have a source of fire resistance, as taking 150% damage from fire can be dangerous.

This item has better stats than fire dragon scales: ice scales offer +1 base AC (and +1 max enchantment) with no extra encumbrance. However, players may prefer fire resistance over cold resistance. This mostly applies to Zot, as orbs of fire exist, but orbs of ice don't.

Paradoxically, a Fire Magic specialist may actually find these scales useful: combined with a staff of fire and a ring of fire, such a character would have two spell enhancers, and a level each of fire and cold resistance.

Trolls and Oni, unable to wear normal plate armour, may want to wear these even without fire resistance. Just be careful with it.

History

  • Prior to 0.19, ice dragon scales were called ice dragon armour, and it was obtained by using a scroll of enchant armour on a ice dragon hide.
